alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 20 at 9:09AM EDT until March 23 at 3:13AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River near Oconee. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, The water level begins to flood portions of the dirt parking lot area near the Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp...just upstream and rightbank from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge. Minor flooding continues in the woodlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 15.7 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday morning to a crest of 17.7 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 17 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
